name: interviewtest
description: 1. Make a new array of objects called **productNamePrice** from the products array; it should contain only `productName` and `productPrice` 2. You'll notice that some products have the same name, make a function called **leastPriceWithThisName** which will take one parameter (name). It should return the product with least price which has the parameter `name` passed to the function  	- function format -> ```leastPriceWithThisName(name)``` 3. Extract the total quantity of items from the carts array. 4. Extract a cart item with the least price and a cart item with the max price. 5. Calculate the total price of the cart, keep in mind any discounts applied to a cart item. Note:
